skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: {"id": "2f55b901-efc4-4382-b53c-efc28e51d547", "value": "Change in typical biological growth patterns, such as changing levels of organisms, and mould, fungi, algae, and lichen growth. Does not include changing species distribution."}
{"id": "d2ca3993-ed06-423c-af75-4f2c7fe49912", "value": "Changing diurnal and seasonal humidity patterns, including sustained high and low humidity events."}
{"id": "a460dec0-fa1f-4d55-996f-9bb03f879604", "value": "Changing diurnal and seasonal temperature patterns."}
{"id": "c72a5d41-3538-416a-82bf-67e11bddc46b", "value": "Crystallization and dissolution of salts caused by wetting and drying cycles, temperature, and humidity fluctuations."}
{"id": "05c7906d-cd0d-4dc9-8fa7-ca9b0f205f82", "value": "Mean surface air temperature and its diurnal and seasonal cycles."}

skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:description: {"id": "e0df801e-74f8-46f1-a119-cadab1c1ba2e", "value": "This vocabulary of climate change hazards, the potential negative climate events that may cause damage or loss, builds on the Climatic Impact-Drivers defined by the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change creating a list of climate hazards for heritage."}
skos:ConceptScheme.dcterms:title: {"id": "918b7a91-dd8e-452d-a6cb-a562285a8d96", "value": "FISH Climate Hazards Vocabulary"}

skos:Concept.skos:scopeNote: {"id": "2e9162c3-dc19-431f-82c2-8cca9c72c096", "value": "Expansion and contraction of typical species distribution patterns, includes invasive species."}
{"id": "0c5c879e-3c47-4098-8203-0e22daeee02c", "value": "Wind speed above typical levels."}
{"id": "1ff70dc2-92ae-41c4-9741-890ae97acaa7", "value": "Concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide (CO2) at the surface. Note: distinct from overall radiative effect of CO2 as greenhouse gas."}
{"id": "c54ed4f4-8816-40a8-9fa4-603bbb2b7fc8", "value": "Episodic high water levels in streams and rivers driven by basin runoff and the expected seasonal cycle of flooding."}

{"id": "b6d647a9-eb3b-409c-8100-0ab51625fc89", "value": "Episodic combination of soil moisture supply deficit and atmospheric demand requirements that challenge the vegetation's ability to meet its water needs for transpiration and growth. Note:'agricultural' versus 'ecological' term depends on affected biome."}

{"id": "745697ad-d68a-42e7-a3b3-5f5b93e94019", "value": "Weather conditions conducive to triggering and sustaining wildfires, usually based on a set of indicators and combinations of indicators including temperature, soil moisture, humidity and wind. Fire weather does not include the presence or absence of fuel load. Note: distinct from wildfire occurrence and area burned."}
{"id": "73377282-8347-48c5-9ac7-735d0ac727ff", "value": "Mean precipitation and its diurnal and seasonal cycles."}
{"id": "ebb92274-c282-4d84-8925-247562de5f74", "value": "Ground and atmospheric conditions that lead to geological mass movements, including landslide, mudslide and rockfall."}
{"id": "d9b72fd5-646d-4d1d-84c6-8e2d32f4f5bf", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with precipitation or lack thereof."}
{"id": "32a98551-9c48-42dd-8c6b-848e0b0c3549", "value": "Episodic combination of runoff deficit and evaporative demand that affects surface water or groundwater availability."}

{"id": "b0bd3156-370a-4d2d-b15e-8aca6e36e1a5", "value": "Mean conditions of precipitation and evapotranspiration compared to potential atmospheric and surface water demand, resulting in low mean surface water, low soil moisture and/or low relative humidity."}
{"id": "a38ea5fd-5f54-484a-8bed-7e6e56d666f5", "value": "Episodic high rates of precipitation and resulting localized flooding of streams and flat lands."}
{"id": "2be93a98-f27e-4541-8d81-92b2754e87d6", "value": "Episodic events of heavy precipitation."}
{"id": "ab476aac-3894-4601-8d03-7f2e5d93657b", "value": "Melting of the permafrost due to increasing global temperatures."}
{"id": "fd2d5e42-f4cf-4972-b06c-0c84d0cbd674", "value": "Rise of sea level due to high storm winds."}
{"id": "dc4ad2f1-03b0-4885-b5c8-9ae2683c1bf2", "value": "Episodic severe storms including extratropical cyclones, thunderstorms, wind gusts, derechos and tornados."}
{"id": "7e0ceb2e-4b6f-432f-8ac7-daa111edcf6f", "value": "A group of thunderstorms causing long-lived straight-lined wind storms."}
{"id": "abc5522a-1abd-4374-9e4f-84ae9835200b", "value": "A rotating column of air, connecting a cloud to the surface of the Earth."}
{"id": "386add29-024f-47b2-ae79-b3e876182cd3", "value": "A storm with thunder and lightning. Sometimes causes hail, heavy rain, and high winds."}
{"id": "a4418c2d-3080-48de-8a2b-65139929fad1", "value": "Pellets of solid precipitation."}

{"id": "74a82131-3aed-433d-adda-ab91ae2036d0", "value": "Low-pressure systems occuring in middle latitutdes, capable of causing extreme precipitation, storm surges, extreme winds, sea level and wave build up."}
{"id": "ec1fc762-1e04-4f0b-8205-c7eac3cc1f5a", "value": "Wave movement and the related changes in connected forces (for example, buoyancy or hydrostatic force)."}
{"id": "63cd6648-9ef9-4a6b-8799-6e3848388542", "value": "Episodic flooding of coastal areas. Connected to rising sea levels, storm surges, wave action, and high tides."}
{"id": "fb49cb45-0e87-4c60-95ec-bbb8281e711f", "value": "Low temperature events. Includes the effects of wind-chill, does not include snow and ice conditions."}
{"id": "36f087b2-f09e-4eea-9a04-014d6a539c6e", "value": "Episodic cold air temperature events potentially exacerbated by wind."}
{"id": "a5505bda-afcb-4f18-b3a0-0b617c61e793", "value": "Rapid changes in relative humidity levels, can be due to diurnal cycles or fast-moving weather systems."}
{"id": "687bc73a-a2ef-44cf-a774-e691e1889c43", "value": "Changing patterns of ice formations, often leading to previously frozen areas becoming ice-free."}
{"id": "3ba40820-4afb-4f2a-b877-424858bb4b68", "value": "Destabilisation of shorelines."}
{"id": "a22d8df7-f319-4755-a868-fb1f00e082a5", "value": "The characteristics and seasonality of ice formations on the ocean and freshwater bodies of water."}
{"id": "b18dd268-e227-44d0-8d0c-24e57834f07a", "value": "Rapid melting of ice or snowpack."}
{"id": "3107dc9e-d783-48e4-a8e0-0822236a3ebc", "value": "Storms producing solid hailstones."}
{"id": "28d49c52-e576-4693-8d5e-9b9c373a3a36", "value": "Cryospheric mass movements and the conditions of collapsing snowpack."}
{"id": "673d4fac-ada5-497f-b28d-ce735e8ff62b", "value": "Permanently frozen deep soil layers, their ice characteristics, and the characteristics of seasonally frozen soils above."}
{"id": "1bfae7a6-e57a-4a43-9b4a-ea6001d56575", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with many aspects of the cryosphere which are regions with snow and ice."}
{"id": "51ec7755-5271-430d-9640-6c020bee004e", "value": "High snowfall and ice storm events including freezing rain and rain-on-snow conditions."}
{"id": "d09e82a0-1be6-48ca-8c86-29f5b12ac7ef", "value": "Snowpack seasonality and characteristics of glaciers and ice sheets including calving events and meltwater."}
{"id": "aad9257d-439e-45e7-b012-223476084d74", "value": "Rapid loss or movement of coastlines."}
{"id": "7c5d2b8a-a94e-4072-9665-62ac13627071", "value": "Freeze and thaw events near the land surface and their seasonality."}
{"id": "f24f15f0-1cf1-4d75-9e74-a4b46c70cc21", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with air temperature."}
{"id": "9a574c62-3dde-4190-89d4-7c93076287aa", "value": "Episodic high air temperature events potentially exacerbated by humidity."}
{"id": "6b3201c4-a376-4d4d-a9cd-618849e023b1", "value": "Storms causing the tranpsort of soil and fine dust particles."}
{"id": "4b7e495e-f295-4eb4-8a58-bbaadc9fbe0f", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with atmospheric circulation and storms"}
{"id": "ba4440a1-4fd9-416c-bf45-47a8654dbdf3", "value": "Mean wind speeds and transport patterns and their diurnal and seasonal cycles,"}
{"id": "473d53dd-209e-48e5-bb47-e96c047ad316", "value": "Strong, rotating storm originating over tropical oceans with high winds, rainfall and storm surges."}
{"id": "f6f0af5a-0a69-4f80-9ef1-437dd3e13267", "value": "Mean temperature profile of ocean through the seasons, including heat content at different depths and associated stratification."}
{"id": "369ea6fa-7542-44a5-b989-d496d7c182b0", "value": "The continuous patterns of seawater movement."}
{"id": "2b7ede31-2094-489a-b85e-1f6a31ea7ebd", "value": "Changing water temperatures."}
{"id": "990d2cf8-d345-4484-b9fc-b36c6196637b", "value": "Profile of ocean water-dissolved oxygen and episodic low oxygen events."}
{"id": "342825c6-d45c-4d03-8bf5-d23ce7111e18", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with ocean thermal structure and chemistry."}
{"id": "b359bd08-a7ea-4e48-9db5-b77be4af1fca", "value": "Profile of ocean salinity and assoicated seasonal stratification. Note: distinct from salinization of freshwater resources."}
{"id": "ac64f130-29e0-428f-ab0b-8a951e908df8", "value": "Episodic extreme ocena temperatures."}
{"id": "2bbdb8b7-6627-406d-9db3-ea963fc3e08a", "value": "Profile of ocean water pH levels and accompanying concentrations of carbonate and bicarbonate ions."}
{"id": "52ee11bc-eabe-4dbe-8dcc-509fca2711d1", "value": "Extreme drying of hygroscopic materials."}
{"id": "cba2470f-be8f-4471-b2a0-2889b355f637", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated primarily with the land and sea interface."}

{"id": "07f38afb-f3a5-4f96-beab-46e51856defc", "value": "Flooding driven by episodic high coastal water levels that result from a combination of relative sea level rise, tides, storm surge and wave setup."}
{"id": "2b4b4b3d-f2e7-43a5-92f9-e71a5e1ba356", "value": "Long term or episodic change in shoreline position caused by relative sea level rise, nearshore currents, waves and storm surge."}
{"id": "048e3602-43b1-4cd9-ae22-9547e02a56f9", "value": "The local mean sea surface height relative to the local solid surface."}
{"id": "150026a9-71ef-46e7-8ed7-686de5a520ff", "value": "Lifting of the ground due to the swelling of the soil."}
{"id": "031e4ec8-0711-41c8-9d62-ce5434c13265", "value": "Collapse or lowering of the ground due to soil shrinkage."}
{"id": "adc70814-66f1-49c6-8485-ae9f2a0ebb4c", "value": "Volume changes in the soil as a result of changes in moisture content."}
{"id": "eed9026a-7a80-4576-9870-41a1fc2ae448", "value": "Low-pressure systems forming over oceans characterised by high winds, heavy precipitation, and storm surge."}
{"id": "9ec02427-acb9-4c4f-8857-576afd53f3df", "value": "Long-term land degradation in which one of the three (biological productivity, ecological integrity or value to humans) is reduced or lost."}
{"id": "cbb13012-a7fe-48e6-9251-abf9412bf9e1", "value": "Strong winds causing the transportation of sand and soil."}

{"id": "7afd6b6e-1d02-4e90-84ec-f8e37518a23e", "value": "Atmospheric conditions that increase the likelihood of high particulate matter or ozone concentrations or chemical processes generating air pollutants. Note: distinct from aerosol emissions or air pollution concentrations themselves."}
{"id": "b4a96d1c-40d0-42ec-84c9-c5486c3e1bda", "value": "A rapid fall in temperature."}
{"id": "35f39a1f-94a2-461a-8280-77bb7cd1d507", "value": "A geological mass movement of soil, debris, mud or rocks"}
{"id": "4767a3a0-1e20-4a53-9bc6-a217245db5b8", "value": "Mass movement of fine or liquified debris."}
{"id": "11d51fa7-2e7e-4f4f-99d3-77899d6f9027", "value": "Rockslide or fall due to geological mass movement."}
{"id": "6ab5162e-dcff-427b-b57c-a5be58e85dba", "value": "Rainfall on existing snowpack."}
{"id": "61c37eea-3d0f-4dbb-9cd6-4535133f129c", "value": "Diurnal or seasonal changes of freeze-thaw cycles."}
{"id": "5f876357-18f1-40c6-a8c9-45f9c7afeb30", "value": "Climatic Impact-Drivers associated with atmospheric chemistry and radiation."}
{"id": "dbc68819-1341-4be2-8f60-156ace38241d", "value": "Balanace of net shortwave, longwave and ultraviolet radiation at the Earth's surface and their diurnal and seasonal patterns."}
{"id": "58d5023d-50b0-46ce-954c-b08489c49af0", "value": "Fluctuations in concentration of dissolved oxygen in seawater."}
{"id": "a24d88d6-c5fc-4af6-a949-2b463dee470d", "value": "Diurnal and seasonal periods when fires are likely to start and spread."}
{"id": "3d7fadf2-f5a4-41d2-b101-70d03f24c079", "value": "Mass movement of snow, ice and rocks, often in mountainous areas."}
{"id": "785b39da-6357-4047-8617-3ee8aabb8197", "value": "Changing patterns in average wind movement, such as changing directions of prevailing winds."}
{"id": "296d8e58-2161-4506-ad3a-f6c2cf4982a5", "value": "A large unplanned fire, often spreading quickly."}
{"id": "3c7af441-b4eb-4aaa-b6be-42d07efacbda", "value": "A period of drier-than-normal conditions for the area and season."}
{"id": "3e8dcfdb-f450-4129-bc8c-22ac185e1286", "value": "Freeze-thaw events."}
{"id": "b4c0b506-741c-4eb0-8645-d1168b1b4356", "value": "Changing patterns in average wind speed."}
{"id": "f50cf62a-93e4-4ba8-a128-75f50534f760", "value": "An extended period of high temperatures."}
{"id": "481c8daa-7aa8-4d85-86b1-e8d751baedaf", "value": "Rising mean sea surface height. Caused by melting ice sheets and glaciers and the expansion of seawater as it warms."}
{"id": "4dbb0eb1-a542-4bed-b9be-70a1c35dc4eb", "value": "Movement of saline waters into freshwater zones"}
{"id": "df04a991-d4f4-4652-a74f-3d2ba15e59ad", "value": "Storm characterized by freezing rain."}
{"id": "1ce4a963-0ea8-43e4-8b0e-ed8812894837", "value": "Melting, shrinking, and calving of glaciers."}
{"id": "97280d4f-3665-4f3a-bbcf-6e009001955f", "value": "High temperature events, including heat waves."}
{"id": "489129e1-7360-402f-9259-25d3c2475e29", "value": "Rising levels of water in rivers, streams or creeks."}
{"id": "f28c7a9b-b2c0-48e1-8864-150c7a0f5c09", "value": "Higher than average snowfall events."}
{"id": "f1433aac-176a-45df-a91f-fad649f962d8", "value": "Lifting of the soil due to swelling caused by the pressure of ice moving towards the surface of the ground."}
{"id": "d9ff5890-e6bb-474d-9cc1-9f7bb2db1fc9", "value": "Amount of salt dissolved in sea water."}
{"id": "27fa28e5-ba4b-435a-97d5-206b90b33205", "value": "Strong winds causing the transportation of dust and soil."}
{"id": "8a726e99-caf5-4338-a678-35f25615ac2c", "value": "Changing diurnal and seasonal patterns of precipitation. Does not include high precipitation events."}
{"id": "920d819f-14ad-4d0f-b2fd-b69cdac87d57", "value": "Rain that freezes upon contact with cold surfaces."}
{"id": "181a9445-4e8e-41e4-aac8-08d92699f1d6", "value": "Episodes of extreme low oxygen levels in the ocean."}
{"id": "fc857dd2-71c8-4666-b0cf-6f909185490d", "value": "Flooding caused by sustained high water table levels."}
{"id": "a078e50e-756b-475d-8ec4-8cc49f70b79e", "value": "Episodes of extreme high ocean temperatures."}
{"id": "c019ba12-770d-4aad-bb92-712f6fb1b87e", "value": "Localised flooding of low-lying areas due to heavy precipitation. Independent of nearby bodies of water."}
{"id": "cdb0d1c1-7e8e-4440-8641-16d1cb9cf13a", "value": "Changing levels of water pH."}
{"id": "0a1e3987-c118-4ef0-bf03-b6b728c7b4ec", "value": "Fluctuation in water table levels."}
{"id": "a6f158e4-3b66-44c0-9d77-1ed4755871fc", "value": "Rain and wind occurring together, giving rain a horizontal velocity."}

{"id": "145be20f-9af6-43cc-868a-6d7d50edbdd7", "value": "Long term or episodic changes of shorelines. Caused by storms, rising sea levels, wave action, tides, wind-driven rain, ocean currents, and ice."}
